website_summaries.verdict: The streamlined Adidas Seeley XT sneakers are an iteration of the Adidas Seeley, an excellent skate shoe from the Adidas Originals line. With a low-key take on classic skate style, the sneaker’s timeless and minimalist look goes far beyond the skatepark. The mash-up heritage style and skate-ready features of the Seeley XT give the sneakers that substantial quality.
pros: According to the majority of skateboard enthusiasts, the Adidas Seeley XT’s overall construction is remarkably good
Many purchasers are happy with these skateboarding-inspired kicks
The shoes are comfortable enough for all-day wear, as what some wearers have observed
Several have commented that these low-top shoes are more substantial than those skate shoes from other skating brands
Generally, the fit and feel are positive when wearing these sneakers as what sneaker fans have experienced
Based on dozens of reviews, the Seeley XT from Adidas is durable and has an easy-to-wear build
Numerous users admire the shoe’s minimalist design and colorway
These cool kicks are highly recommended by a great number of testers
They are a great value for money, as per a lot of buyers
cons: A couple of skaters have claimed that these sneakers only have limited arch support
Few wearers have felt that the shoes are a bit firm at the start

customer_reviews.title: Nice but stitches ruin them from the inside
customer_reviews.text: These would be very nice sneakers if they did not have sewing inside the sneaker towards the toe that hurts my foot very bad .. that or those few stitches totally ruin the comfort of these shoes ; SADLY
customer_reviews.author: Rondal Cogar

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it’s real adidas, they fit about a size too big.
customer_reviews.text: These were ordered a size 7 in men. I am a 8.5 in women wide. The 7 was about a size too big o ordered another pair in a soccer adidas shoe 6.5 but it’s a bit snug. These are about half a size too big if u order these. Also not sure if it’s real adidas March. Be forewarned before spending full price but not sure if it is authentic adidas. Sorry, but be sure to read these reviews!!
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Good skate shoes
customer_reviews.text: This are exactly what you see in the picture, great for skating
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: shoes that last
customer_reviews.text: love Adidas. Always have always will. These shoes are going to last forever. Quality is their motto
customer_reviews.author: Thatoneoverthere

customer_reviews.title: yes! yes! yes! please buy
customer_reviews.text: this shoe is very good for skating! i have been using these for months and they are still in great shape! very good quality and perfect fit!! definitely going to purchase these again
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Yale Nogin "The Hero Dad"

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I received my order package was good BUT, when I open to see my shoes they had BLACK SPOT like if they drop them or something . It smell new but there was black spots that was not removable.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Nice every day shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my bf for every day wear. He loves them!! He usually wears a 10.5 but I got a size 11 and they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Paint em green & put a bell on them
customer_reviews.text: Dope shoe when you first get it.... But within 2 weeks of wearig them the shape completely goes away and they turn into this weird looking elf shoe.... Eehhh....
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe I bought specifically for skating.
customer_reviews.text: I can't skate in my pink Nyjah's, or my Alley Oops, or me Retro Jordan's. The gum sole was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: DJ 4EST

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: So nice, got me off of vans for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Stoked!!
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I was hoping for and came quick!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas DuSell
